items.title: Where To Watch Hard Truths: Showtimes & Streaming Status
items.description: Hard Truths is the latest film by acclaimed director Mike Leigh, and it's earning some buzz this awards season. Here's where and when you can see it.

items.title: 5 Theories For How Jim Carrey Can Still Return For Sonic The Hedgehog 4
items.description: Considering Sonic the Hedgehog 3's ending, there are a few different ways in which Jim Carrey's Doctor Robotnik could return in Sonic the Hedgehog 4.
